photoalbum.controller

Class PhotoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • photoalbum.controller.MasterController
      • photoalbum.controller.PhotoController

  • public class PhotoController
extends MasterController
    Here the user can view, manage and delete a set of photos.
    Author:
    Paul Warner & Kenny Zhang

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: MasterController
